name: The Lonely Hearts Petshop
description:
The Lonely Hearts Petshop is a cat to human matchmaking visual novel game. In this narrative focused experience, players are tasked with helping to run a pet shop owned by anthropomorphic cats

It's your first day at The Lonely Hearts Petshop! Interview potential adopters, choose the perfect match for the customers, talk with fellow co-workers, and explore the beautiful Jonker Street.

FEATURES

Jonker Street

  • The Lonely Hearts Petshop is set in the beautiful Jonker Street, Malacca. 
  • Explore the streets, get to know the Cats of Jonker Street

Make Your Catsona

  • Customize your look! In the future game, we will add more customization and you can buy clothes and accessories from the shops in Jonker Street

Interview Cats

  • Listen to the stories of the customers, and choose which human will be purrfect for them

Consequences

  • The Dogs are coming for the humans. Players will need to find homes for the humans of The Lonely Hearts Petshop before it's too late!
  • Player's decision will have consequences, big and small, good or bad

Are you up for a fur-midable time?
